Welcome

Hello! This is the website for Nicholas Geyer. I am a Research Associate and Ph.D. Candidate in the Department of Atmospheric Sciences at Colorado State University. I work for the Denning Biocycle Research Group.

Within the pages of this website you will find examples of code, writing, and derivations I have put together over the years. Please enjoy the visit!

Note: If you would like to get in contact with me, then my preferred method is through the contact form.
